Publications


  • M. A. Buen-Abad, J. Buch, J. Fan, and J. S. C. Leung, Galactic Origin of Relativistic Bosons and XENON1T Excess, (2020), arXiv: 2006.12488.

  • J. Buch, J. Fan, and J. S. C. Leung, Implications of the Gaia Sausage for Dark Matter Nuclear Interactions, Phys. Rev. D 101, no. 6, 063026 (2020), arXiv: 1910.06356.

  • J. Buch, S. C. J. Leung, and J. Fan, Using Gaia DR2 to Constrain Local Dark Matter Density and Thin Dark Disk, JCAP 1904, 026 (2019), arXiv: 1808.05603.

  • J. Fan, P. Jaiswal, and S. C. Leung, Jet Observables and Stops at 100 TeV Collider, Phys. Rev. D 96, no. 3, 036017 (2017), arXiv: 1704.03014.
